data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,763,600 people living in the state of Chiang Mai.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chiang Mai, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Chiang Mai, Thailand today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 11,404 believers in Chiang Mai to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,752,196 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,763,600 souls living in the state of Chiang Mai with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tai Khun people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Chiang Mai.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Chiang Mai, Thailand.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chiang Mai, Thailand has a population of 1,763,600.

We estimate Chiang Mai has 11,404 people who might know Jesus, 11,641 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,740,555 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 11,404 believers in the state of Chiang Mai the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.
